item.title: Block is the latest to get an S&P 500 nod, and its stock is climbing
item.description: Robinhood misses out on S&P 500 inclusion once again, as Square parent company is chosen to replace Hess.

item.title: ‘We are acquaintances, not friends’: My neighbors need somewhere to stay after a house fire. Do I say yes?
item.description: “We feel obliged to offer our house to this couple to live in while they deal with this horrible experience.”

item.title: I have early Alzheimer’s and my husband has stage 4 kidney disease. We just inherited $50K. How can this help us?
item.description: “We have a 401(k) with $20,000, and $29,000 in a Roth IRA.”

item.title: My husband’s brother left his $600K estate to a friend. Can we contest the will? He experienced oxygen deprivation due to COPD.
item.description: “Around 30 days before passing, he changed everything to go to a friend.”

item.title: Trump signs the Genius Act into law, in significant step for U.S. crypto regulation
item.description: President Trump said the crypto industry was once “mocked and dismissed and counted out,” but now could become a big buyer of U.S. government debt.
